text: I know this is old but I added this to <http://ideas.HubSpot.com|ideas.HubSpot.com> - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Marketplace-Send-Invoices-to-Buyers/idi-p/946175#M173808> (it gets a little tiring having to draft these up all the time)

I know this is old but I added this to <http://ideas.HubSpot.com|ideas.HubSpot.com> - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Marketplace-Send-Invoices-to-Buyers/idi-p/946175#M173808> (it gets a little tiring having to draft these up all the time)

I just added added this idea: *Marketplace - Send Invoices to Buyers* and would appreciate upvotes: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Marketplace-Send-Invoices-to-Buyers/idi-p/946175> - I personally don't fully understand why receipts are not enough, but I get a lot of requests for invoices (which in my mind are pre-sale and makes no sense, but anywho). It would be nice to not have to manually put together invoices!
